00032 void BroadcastA(int* A)
00033 {
00034   MPI_Bcast(A, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 void BroadcastTask(int* task)
00039 {
00040   MPI_Bcast(task, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00041 }

00044 // slaves overwride sldet
00045 void BroadcastSlaterDet(SlaterDet* Q)
00046 {
00047   if (mpirank == 0) {
00048     // send
00049     MPI_Bcast(Q, sizeof(SlaterDet), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00050     MPI_Bcast(Q->idx, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00051     MPI_Bcast(Q->ng, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00052     MPI_Bcast(Q->G, Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian), 
00053               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00054   } else {
00055     int* idx = Q->idx; 
00056     int* ng = Q->ng;
00057     Gaussian* G = Q->G;
00058 
00059     MPI_Bcast(Q, sizeof(SlaterDet), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00060     Q->idx = idx;
00061     Q->ng = ng;
00062     Q->G = G;
00063     MPI_Bcast(Q->idx, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00064     MPI_Bcast(Q->ng, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00065     MPI_Bcast(Q->G, Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian), 
00066               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00067     
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 void BroadcastSlaterDetAux(const SlaterDet* Q, SlaterDetAux* X)
00073 {
00074     MPI_Bcast(X->Gaux, SQR(Q->ngauss)*sizeof(GaussianAux), 
00075               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00076     MPI_Bcast(X->n, SQR(Q->A)*sizeof(complex double),
00077               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00078     MPI_Bcast(X->o, SQR(Q->A)*sizeof(complex double),
00079               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00080     MPI_Bcast(&X->ovlap, 1, 
00081               MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void BroadcastgradSlaterDetAux(const SlaterDet* Q, gradSlaterDetAux* dX)
00086 {
00087   MPI_Bcast(&dX->ngauss, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00088   MPI_Bcast(dX->dGaux, SQR(dX->ngauss)*sizeof(gradGaussianAux),
00089             MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00090   MPI_Bcast(dX->dno, Q->A*dX->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00091             MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00092 }

00097 void BroadcastInteraction(Interaction* Int)
00098 {
00099   if (mpirank == 0) {
00100     // send
00101     MPI_Bcast(Int, sizeof(Interaction), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00102     MPI_Bcast(Int->c, Int->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent),
00103               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00104   } else {
00105     // receive
00106     MPI_Bcast(Int, sizeof(Interaction), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00107     Int->c = malloc(Int->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent));
00108     MPI_Bcast(Int->c, Int->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent),
00109               MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00110   }
00111   
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00117 void BroadcastParameters(void* par, int size)
00118 {
00119   if (mpirank == 0) {
00120     // send
00121     MPI_Bcast(par, size, MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00122   } else {
00123     // receive
00124     MPI_Bcast(par, size, MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00125   }
00126 }
